summary: must be used with Weapons of the Third Era MoS edition mod! it make all one handed and two handed katana \'\'Silent\'\' a must use for stealth character with 2 handed!
descriptionHtml:
this mod is used with Weapons of the Third Era MoS edition mod, so you must have this file to make it work properly.

Weapons of the Third Era MoS edition: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12892/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D12892&pUp=1

it take all the katana from Weapons of the Third Era MoS and vanilla game (one handed and two handed) and put them Silent. when you will sneak kill an oponent with a 2 handed katana per exemple, it will make the same noise than killing it with a dagger (more stealth) 

some people asked me to make this kind of mod while ago, so I made mine public :) 
hope it work well, if not, I\'d like some feedback

I use skyrim + dawnguard + dragonborn with latest version... hope it will work with everyone!
author: Gaboury
